S:log-item.D:comment: LUCENE-736: Sloppy phrase query with repeating terms matches wrong docs. For example query "B C B"~2 matches the doc "A B C D E". Search time cost of this fix is 4%, for sloppy phrase search. This fix also partially brings back the the tests checkSkipTo() in QueryUtils, (which was disabled by LUCENE-730), but this is now invoked only for non Boolean scorers.
